subject: fix(build): resolve TS2532 'possibly undefined' in TutorialModal
body:
Array index access `steps[currentStep]` in the template returns
`TutorialStep | undefined`, causing vue-tsc to reject the build.
Introduced an `activeStep` computed property with an explicit type
assertion so the template accesses a guaranteed `TutorialStep`.
